#include<stdio.h>
 
 
 
int main()
{
	unsigned long int i,j,k,l,m,n,d,count,flag,x;
	int T;
	scanf("%d",&T);
 
	while(T--)
	{
	scanf("%lu",&n);
	scanf("%lu",&d);
 
	j=1;
	x=1;
	count=0;
	while(count!=n)
	{
	j=x;
		flag=0;
		while(j!=0)
		{
		k=j%10;
		j=j/10;
			if(k==d)
			{
			flag=1;
			break;
			}
		}
 
		if(flag==0)
		{
		count++;
		}
		x++;
	}
	printf("%d\n",--x);
	}
	return 0;
}
